name: interorbital
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between the eye sockets (= the bones around the eye): a dinosaur with a broad interorbital bridge The average adult's interorbital distance is 28 millimetres. Related word
orbital
More examplesFewer examplesThe large and unusual interorbital septal region appears to be correlated with the enlargement and medial convergence of its orbits.The hallmark of all upper facial clefts is an increased interorbital distance.Six of the seven patients showed no change in the interorbital distance for 24 months after the operation.
